name: Regis Social Media
tagline: Santa Monica Social Media Marketing Company
description:
Regis Social Media is a boutique, family-run social media agency in the West Los Angeles area, servicing clients from the Pacific Northwest to Baja California Sur.
We believe that all businesses can take advantage of utilizing social media, and while we are focused on providing concierge-level service for a select number of small business clients, we also consult and create information-based products to empower others to manage their own social media management.
